channel.title: Posts on Nacho Dev Blog!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nacho Dev Blog!

item.title: A wild webpage appeared
item.description: Welcome! I decided that it was finally time to unify my blog and portfolio in one place. Before, I had Blogger running my blog. On the other hand, I created a simple github page to host my portfolio. Not good. And then HUGO appeared. I noticed this while reading someone else's blog and oh boi. Here we are! I have to say that HUGO is quite nice and easy to use.
